summary: This is an FBI 302 interview summary of a witness, identified as the mother of a potential victim, conducted in Stockholm, Sweden on February 5, 2020. The witness describes how Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell attempted to recruit her daughter, starting when the daughter was a student at Interlochen, and details a trip the daughter took with them to New Mexico at age 15. The witness expresses regret and anger, blaming Maxwell for targeting girls.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as a financier who, with Ghislaine Maxwell, attempted to recruit the witness's daughter, visited her at Interlochen, offered to pay for her schooling, and invited her to travel and live with them.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as living with Epstein and actively involved in recruiting the witness's daughter, offering to be a 'big sister,' paying for scholarships, and arranging travel. The witness calls her 'a wolf' who 'picks the girls.'

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the famous people who visited Epstein's house, which the witness says made her daughter think Epstein couldn't be a criminal.

persons.name: Ulf
persons.context: Mentioned as living with the witness and her daughter in an apartment in New York.

persons.name: Jean-
persons.context: Mentioned as being at Interlochen at the time the witness's family moved to New York.

connections.description: Described as living together and working in tandem to recruit and groom the witness's daughter, including offering scholarships, travel, and housing.
Maxwell actively cultivated a relationship with the daughter, offering to be a 'big sister' and take her under her wing, which the witness now sees as predatory grooming.
Epstein, presented as a 'godfather figure,' also pursued the daughter, offering to support her education at Juilliard and inviting her to travel and live with him.
The witness is the mother of the potential victim. She describes her daughter's interactions with Epstein/Maxwell, her initial trust, and subsequent guilt.

events.title: Initial Contact by Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell first contacts the witness, asking about her daughter and revealing she lives with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Daughter's Trip to New Mexico
events.description: The witness's daughter, then age 15, travels with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell on Epstein's jet from West Palm Beach to New Mexico for a weekend. The daughter reported meeting famous people and attending a big party.

events.title: Move to New York
events.description: The witness and her daughter move from West Palm Beach to New York City in the summer, before the daughter starts at the Professional Children's School.

events.title: Warning at Swedish Party
events.description: At a party in Sweden, the witness overhears a young woman planning to meet Epstein and warns her not to go.

events.title: FBI Interview in Stockholm
events.description: The witness is interviewed by U.S. and Swedish authorities in Stockholm, Sweden, providing detailed information about Epstein and Maxwell's interactions with her daughter.

locations: 45 Wall Street, apartment 1007, New York, NY
keyFacts: The witness's daughter was targeted by Epstein and Maxwell while she was a student at the Interlochen arts academy, with Epstein presented as a 'godfather figure' there.
The daughter traveled with Epstein and Maxwell on his private jet to New Mexico for a weekend when she was 15 years old.
The witness states that Maxwell told her she would pay for her daughter's scholarship at Interlochen and repeatedly asked for the daughter to move in with her and Epstein.
The witness blames Ghislaine Maxwell specifically, quoting her as saying, 'She is a wolf. She picks the girls.'
After moving to New York, the witness called Epstein's lawyer to demand Epstein stop contacting her daughter, threatening a 'big lawsuit.'
